title: The Circle catfish finally meet in real life - and they are both horrified
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Brutal scenes on The Circle culminated in the two catfish finally meeting last night - and they both look completely horrified.

Jay's time was up last night as influencers Tim and Ella decided he had no more to offer to The Circle and subsequently blocked him.

The pair seemed split between him and Brooke, but Tim's suspicions that Jay was actually his mum pushed him to block him.

Of course, Tim's suspicions were correct as Jay was being played by his mum Katie.

But there is another catfish lurking about - who only Georgina has picked up on during the portrait mode challenge.

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: Channel 4)

Georgina painted a picture of fake mum Sammie, who is actually James, and questioned whether she was actually a mum.

However Sammie, aka James, brutally bit back and branded the fake claim "vile".

So 'Jay' had no reason to suspect that her best mate and single mum 'Sammie' was actually a man.

As is Circle tradition, the blocked player had a chance to meet whoever they wanted and, with a bottle of prosecco in hand, Katie headed down to Sammie's flat.

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: Channel 4)

But when she opened the door, a topless James sat there looking utterly horrified.

The rest of the meeting will air tonight, but fans were on the edge of their seats after the awkward meeting.

One tweeted: "I’m still shook."

While another commented: "I AM BUZZIN’ #WhenCatfishMeetsCatfish."

A third remarked: "This is the one I've been waiting for. Can't wait for Tim to be vindicated when Katie leaves her message for the players. Ended the show at exactly the right moment. Had me jumping up and down, whooping and laughing."

*The Circle returns tonight at 10pm on Channel 4
description: The Channel 4 show turned brutal during the portrait mode challenge, and things will get even more awkward as the fake pals finally meet
